pages.text: veini-mraetun hafet mim ba`liha nusuzen ev i`radan fela cunaha `aleyhima ey yusliha beynehuma sulha. vessulhu hayr. veuhdirati-l'enfusu-ssuhh. vein tuhsinu vetetteku feinne-llahe kane bima ta`melune habira
velen testeti`u en ta`dilu beyne-nnisai velev harastum fela temilu kulle-lmeyli fetezeruha kelmu`allekah. vein tuslihu vetetteku feinne-llahe kane gafurar rahima
veiy yeteferraka yugni-llahu kullem min se`atih. vekane-llahu vasi`an hakima

velillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. velekad vessayne-llezine utu-lkitabe min kablikum veiyyakum eni-tteku-llah. vein tekfuru feinne lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. vekane-llahu ganiyyen hamida
velillahi ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. vekefa billahi vekila
iy yese' yuzhibkum eyyuhe-nnasu veye'ti biaharin. vekane-llahu `ala zalike kadira
men kane yuridu sevabe-ddunya fe`inde-llahi sevabu-ddunya vel'ahirah. vekane-llahu semi`am besira
